subject: Gig offer
message: Yo guys, I have a new offer for you. You can play in our bar on 24th Sep. 400€ for the gig and free beers all night. Let me know if you are in till next week. Joe.

subject: Friday Night Gig
message: Hello, we are looking to book your band for a gig at our jazz club on the 1st of November. The gig will pay 350€ and we will provide a complimentary dinner and drinks for the band members. Let us know if you are available. Cheers, Jazz Club Booking Team.

subject: New Year’s Eve Event
message: Greetings, we are organizing a special New Year’s Eve event and we would love to have your band perform. The event will be held on the 31st of December and the payment is 800€. Additionally, we will provide a luxurious stay at a nearby hotel. Please let us know your decision by the 10th of August. Regards, Sam.
